amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $5 million in funds from the Special Operations Command flying hours budget to the Preservation of the Force and Family Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect funds within the Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lamborn amendment (A004) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Lamborn.
